properties.NAME: Chuka Water Supply Project - Tharaka Nithi County, Chuka Igamba Ngombe
properties.SCOPE: Intake Works at Ruguti River. Treatment Works 15000 M3/Day. 7 Km of Raw Water and Treated water mains Ranging from 450mm 150mm. 15.4 km transmission main. 2No. Storage tanks of 500 m3 each.

properties.NAME: Chogoria Water Supply Project - Tharaka Nithi County - Maara
properties.SCOPE: Intake Works at Maara Manyi River. Treatment Works of 15,000 m3/day. 3 Km Raw Water Gravity main. 2 No Storage Tanks of 500 m3 each and 16.20 Km Treated water gravity mains ranging from 450mm 150mm pipeline.

properties.NAME: KerugoyaKutus Water Supply Project - Kirinyaga County - Kirinyaga Central, Gichugu, Ndia
properties.SCOPE: Intake Works at Kiringa and Thiba Rivers. Treatment Works of 30,000m3/day. Raw water mains 5.8 km. 3 No. Storage Tanks, 500 m3 each. 63 Km Treated water Transmission and Distribution Mains ranging from 600mm to 150mm.

properties.NAME: Mandera Water Supply Project - Mandera County, Mandera North
properties.SCOPE: Intake Works at Daua River. 5 No. Infiltration Wells. Treatment Works of 16,000 M3/Day. 9 No. Storage Tanks. 316 Km Treated water Transmission and Distribution Mains ranging from 500mm - 63mm.

properties.NAME: Marsabit Water Supply Project - Marsabit County - Saku
properties.SCOPE: Raise Bakuli Dam from 11.5m to 20m. 7 km Dia 200mm rising main. Treatment Works of 1,300 M3/Day. New Gravity Main 6km dia 150 mm. 3 No Storage Tanks 225 m3 each.

properties.NAME: Murang�a South Water Supply (Last Mile connectivity) - Murang�a County - Kigumo, Maragwa

properties.NAME: Isiolo Town Water Supply (Last Mile connectivity) - Isiolo County - Isiolo
properties.SCOPE: Laying of 9 Km of water pipeline of 110mm and 12 km DN 225mm sewer lines.

properties.NAME: Garissa Town Water Supply (Last Mile connectivity) - Garissa County - Garissa Town
properties.SCOPE: Rehabilitation of 2 No boreholes. Drilling of 4 No. Large Boreholes. Construction of 1200m3 RC storage tank and 8 Km of 315mm - 150mm transmission mains. Construction of 2No elevated tanks. Rehabilitation of pumping equipment. Rehabilitation of existing tanks.
